messages.message:
Hey Engineering, as mentioned in the lightning talk during the EPD Offsite in Florida, *IT is aiming to have users _fully_ migrated to using Okta SSO to access AWS in lieu of local IAM Users / access keys by Friday April 7th.* 

It is important to note that the new SSO roles are not tied with your old IAM user, and this will impact both your console and CLI access, so please start leveraging Okta SSO access for AWS as soon as you’re able so we can help you iron out any issues before the deadline. I’ve put together a Guidelines and FAQ doc here (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IT/pages/1988657155/AWS+SSO+Guidelines+and+FAQ) for your review, and any access requests can be submitted to <mailto:ithelp@instabase.com|ithelp@instabase.com>.

Additionally, if you know you are done with your old IAM accounts and ready to delete them, please let us know so we can clean up your account early and help reduce some of the crush around April 7th. Thanks!
what’s the expiration time on the SSO AWS keys?
The session length for all of the roles is set to match Okta at 10 hours.
I’ll add that to the FAQ :)
got it, so we’ll need to update our .aws/credentials file every 10h to stay authenticated right?

Oh, I see what you're saying. So SSO will be replacing long term access keys for CLI access because access keys aren't considered best practice (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/accounts/latest/reference/credentials-access-keys-best-practices.html). Each day you'd just need to run `aws sso login --sso-session <my-sso>` which will auto-redirect to your web browser for authentication.
what if i don’t know my current level of access, but i just want to maintain that?

The new roles we've defined aren't 1:1 with the old permissions groups, but the baseEng role is pretty close to the AWSLimitedAccess group in terms of permissions in the `instabase` account with some changes endorsed by EPD leadership. I suggest trying it out and if you find that you need greater permissions than that you can submit a request to <mailto:ithelp@instabase.com|ithelp@instabase.com> so we can help you out!
